name: Vegan Pumpkin Cookies with Chocolate Chunks
description: These vegan pumpkin cookies with huge chocolate chunks are the perfect treat for cold fall days! They're super easy to make and they're so incredibly delicious!
recipeIngredient: 1  flax egg ((1 tablespoon of ground flaxseeds soaked in 3 tablespoons of water for 5 minutes))
3/4 cup chopped vegan chocolate (I used dark and white chocolate)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients and stir with a wooden spoon.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients and stir with a wooden spoon.

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Using a spoon, either form 12 normal sized cookies or 6 jumbo cookies.
recipeInstructions.name: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Using a spoon, either form 12 normal sized cookies or 6 jumbo cookies.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 10-12 minutes. Let the cookies cool down before you eat them. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 10-12 minutes. Let the cookies cool down before you eat them. Enjoy!
